item.title: MIUI OS2.0.102.0.VOYCNXM Recovery update for Xiaomi Pad 7 Pro China
item.description:
New Stable Beta Recovery update available!

Device: Xiaomi Pad 7 Pro China

Codename: muyu

Version: OS2.0.102.0.VOYCNXM | 15.0

Size: 8.1 GB

MD5: 865e739d4ee935e57faeec5ac2b0eaef

Changelog:
[System]
New: Support for one-tap clipboard clearing
Optimization: Bluetooth status bar icon
[Xiaomi HyperConnect]
New: Support for file transfers between different devices using different Xiaomi Accounts
Optimization: Device connection pop-ups
[Gallery]
Optimization: "On this day" feature now supports hiding content
Optimization: Day and month views are available for the start page
Optimization: Search results page can now show the progress of Gallery analysis by AI
Optimization: Search results for identification documents
Optimization: Display layouts for Gallery items
Optimization: Gallery now supports deleting and hiding items via long pressing
Optimization: Search results for time and location keywords
Fix: CAD images were mistakenly placed in Gallery
[Xiaomi Hyper XiaoAi]
Your smart personal assistant
· New visuals with multiple ways to activate the assistant anytime you need it.
Multimodal interaction: Perceive the world around you with your camera and easily recognize objects that appear on your screen.
· Improved search: Supports natural language searches for photos, videos, documents, notes, and recordings.
Smart scenes: Seamlessly integrates system features, letting you perform complex tasks with a single step. This feature also learns your patterns to offer helpful services proactively.
[Game speed booster]
New: Game Turbo performance dashboard
Optimization: Game Turbo interface improvements

Download: Here

Incremental Update: Here
